errorMessage:
Error: Query engine binary for current platform "rhel-openssl-1.0.x" could not be found.
This probably happens, because you built Prisma Client on a different platform.
(Prisma Client looked in "/query-engine-rhel-openssl-1.0.x")
Searched Locations:
  /.prisma/client
  /vercel/workpath0/db
  /
  /vercel/workpath0/db
  /var/task
To solve this problem, add the platform "rhel-openssl-1.0.x" to the "generator" block in the "schema.prisma" file:
generator client {
    provider      = "prisma-client-js"
    binaryTargets = ["native"]
  }
Then run "prisma generate" for your changes to take effect.
  Read more about deploying Prisma Client: https://pris.ly/d/client-generator
